meanings.definition: The skill or ability of a musician.
meanings.sent1: Her musicianships shone through during the piano recital.
meanings.sent2: His musicianships were evident in the way he played the guitar.
meanings.sent3: The cat's musicianships were put to the test when it tried to play the violin.
meanings.sent4: The musicianships of the conductor guided the orchestra like a skilled captain.
meanings.sent5: Through dedicated practice, her musicianships reached new heights.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being a musician.
meanings.sent1: The musicianships of the band members contributed to their harmonious performance.
meanings.sent2: She was praised for her musicianships by the music critics.
meanings.sent3: The dog's musicianships were evident when it howled along with the music.
meanings.sent4: His musicianships were like a beacon of talent in the music industry.
meanings.sent5: The musicianships of the young prodigy amazed the audience.
